title: Clownhouse 1989 DVD-R NTSC WS {Gavin}
description:
Synopsis
From the director of Jeepers Creepers and Jeepers Creepers 2 comes a three-ring circus of madness... and murder! A terrifying creep show of harlequin horrors, Clownhouse proves beyond a bloody doubt... you can never really trust a clown!

Casey is an eleven-year-old boy leery of white-faced, colorfully festooned clowns. Against his better instincts, he goes to the circus with his two brothers to confront his fears. But that same night, three psychopathic killers escape a local mental hospital and head straight for the Big Top, where they unhinge a jack-in-the-box of nightmares for Casey and his brothers!
